vuln_name: Fortinet FortiNAC 远程代码执行漏洞(CVE-2022-39952)
vuln_name_en: Fortinet FortiNAC Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2022-39952)
technical_category: 文件名或路径的外部可控制
description: FortiNAC keyUpload 脚本中存在任意文件写入漏洞，未经身份认证的远程攻击者可利用此漏洞向目标系统写入任意内容，最终可在目标系统上以 Root 权限执行任意命令。
description_en: An arbitrary file write vulnerability exists in the FortiNAC keyUpload script. An unauthenticated remote attacker can use this vulnerability to write arbitrary content to the target system, and eventually execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on the target.
malicious_type: 文件名或路径的外部可控制

vuln_name: ASUS Armoury Crate Service 权限提升漏洞(CVE-2022-42455)
vuln_name_en: ASUS Armoury Crate Service Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CVE-2022-42455)
description: ASUS EC 工具驱动程序（又名 d.sys）存在权限提升漏洞，经过身份认证的本地攻击者利用此漏洞，可以将权限提升至SYSTEM。
description_en: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the ASUS EC tool driver (aka d.sys), which could allow an authenticated local attacker to escalate privileges to SYSTEM.

vuln_name: Git 文件写入漏洞(CVE-2023-23946)
threat_category: 安全特性绕过,代码执行
description:
Git 允许使用git apply，为了防止恶意补丁在工作副本之外创建文件，git apply拒绝试图在符号链接之外写入文件的补丁。但是，当恶意补丁首先创建该符号链接时，可能会欺骗此机制，当应用来自不受信任来源的恶意补丁时，可以在受害者的文件系统上写入任意文件。
此漏洞在 GitLab 的 Gitaly 环境中可能实现命令执行。
description_en:
Git allows the use of git apply, to prevent malicious patches from creating files outside of the working copy,git apply rejects patches that attempt to write files outside the symbolic link. However, this mechanism could be tricked when the malicious patch first creates that symbolic link, and when a malicious patch from an untrusted source is applied, arbitrary files can be written on the victim's filesystem.
This vulnerability could achieve command execution in GitLab's Gitaly environment.
vuln_type: 安全特性绕过,代码执行

vuln_name: Microsoft Exchange Server 远程代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-21707)
vuln_name_en: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2023-21707)
description: Microsoft Exchange Server 存在远程代码执行漏洞，经过身份认证的远程攻击者可利用此漏洞在服务器账户的上下文中执行任意代码。微软将此漏洞标记为“Exploitation More Likely”。
description_en: Microsoft Exchange Server has a remote code execution vulnerability. An authenticated remote attacker can use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the server account. Microsoft labeled this vulnerability as "Exploitation More Likely".
qpe_prod_name: Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 11,Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 12,Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 23,Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Cumulative Update 23

vuln_name: Microsoft Word 远程代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-21716)
vuln_name_en: Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2023-21716)
description: Microsoft Word的RTF解析器（wwlib）中存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以制作包含过多字体表项的RTF文件，并诱导用户打开来利用此漏洞。攻击者可利用多种方式诱导用户下载并打开特制文档，如电子邮件、即时消息等等。用户使用预览窗格也会触发此漏洞。成功利用此漏洞可能在目标系统上以该用户权限执行代码。
description_en: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the RTF parser (wwlib) of Microsoft Word. An attacker can craft an RTF file containing too many font table entries and induce a user to open it to exploit this vulnerability. Attackers can use a variety of ways to induce users to download and open specially crafted documents, such as emails, instant messages, and so on. This vulnerability is also triggered by the user using the preview pane. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may execute code with the user's authority on the target system.
qpe_prod_name: Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2013 Service Pack 1,Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2013 Service Pack 1,Microsoft Office LTSC 2021 for 32-bit editions,Microsoft Word 2013 Service Pack 1 (64-bit editions),Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2021,Microsoft Office Online Server,Microsoft SharePoint Server Subscription Edition,Microsoft Word 2016 (64-bit edition),SharePoint Server Subscription Edition Language Pack,Microsoft Office Web Apps Server 2013 Service Pack 1,Microsoft Word 2013 RT Service Pack 1,Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 64-bit Systems,Microsoft Word 2016 (32-bit edition),Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016,Microsoft Word 2013 Service Pack 1 (32-bit editions),Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac,Microsoft Office LTSC 2021 for 64-bit editions,Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 32-bit Systems,Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019

vuln_name_en: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2023-21706)
description: Microsoft Exchange Server存在多个远程代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-21707、CVE-2023-21706、CVE-2023-21529)。经过身份认证的远程攻击者可利用这些漏洞在服务器账户的上下文中执行任意代码。微软将这些漏洞标记为“Exploitation More Likely”。
description_en: There are multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange Server (CVE-2023-21707, CVE-2020-2023-21706, CVE-2019-21529). An authenticated remote attacker can use these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the server account. Microsoft labeled the vulnerabilities as "Exploitation More Likely".
qpe_prod_name: Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 12,Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 23,Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Cumulative Update 23,Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 Cumulative Update 11

vuln_name_en: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2023-21529)
description: Microsoft Exchange Server存在多个远程代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-21707、CVE-2023-21706、CVE-2023-21529)。经过身份认证的远程攻击者可利用这些漏洞在服务器账户的上下文中执行任意代码。微软将这些漏洞标记为“Exploitation More Likely”。
description_en: There are multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange Server (CVE-2023-21707, CVE-2020-2023-21706, CVE-2019-21529). An authenticated remote attacker can use these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the server account. Microsoft labeled the vulnerabilities as "Exploitation More Likely".

vuln_name: Microsoft Publisher 安全功能绕过漏洞(CVE-2023-21715)
vuln_name_en: Microsoft Publisher Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability (CVE-2023-21715)
description: Microsoft Publisher存在安全特性绕过漏洞，攻击者可通过诱导用户从网站下载并打开特制文件来利用此漏洞，成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以绕过用于阻止不受信任或恶意文件的Office宏策略。此漏洞已被用于在野攻击。
description_en: Microsoft Publisher has a security feature bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability by inducing users to download and open specially crafted files from websites. An attacker who successfully exploits this vulnerability can bypass the Office macro policy used to block untrusted or malicious files. This vulnerability has been used for in-the-wild attacks.
qpe_prod_name: Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 64-bit Systems,Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 32-bit Systems

description_en: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in Windows Graphics Component that allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges on the target system. This vulnerability has been used for in-the-wild attacks.

vuln_name_en: Windows Common Log File System Driver Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CVE-2023-23376)

vuln_name: Adobe ColdFusion 代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-26360)
description: 未经身份验证的远程攻击者利用该漏洞可以执行任意代码，而无需用户交互。目前该漏洞已检测到在野利用。
description_en: An unauthenticated remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code without user interaction. Currently, exploitation of this vulnerability has been detected in the wild.

vuln_name: Microsoft Outlook 权限提升漏洞(CVE-2023-23397)
description: Microsoft Outlook 存在权限提升漏洞，未经身份验证的远程攻击者可以向受害者发送特制的电子邮件，导致受害者连接到攻击者控制的外部 UNC 位置。这会将受害者的 Net-NTLMv2 散列泄露给攻击者，然后攻击者可以将其中继到另一个服务并作为受害者进行身份验证。
description_en: Microsoft Outlook has a privilege escalation vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can send a specially crafted email to the victim, causing the victim to connect to an external UNC location controlled by the attacker. This leaks the victim's Net-NTLMv2 hash to the attacker, who can then relay it to another service and authenticate as the victim.

vuln_name: Nacos 身份认证绕过漏洞(QVD-2023-6271)
description:
开源服务管理平台 Nacos 中存在身份认证绕过漏洞，由于Nacos默认未对token.secret.key进行修改，在鉴权开启的情况下，远程攻击者可以绕过密钥认证进入后台，造成系统受控等后果。
该系统通常部署在内网，用作服务发现及配置管理，历史上存在多个功能特性导致认证绕过、未授权等漏洞，建议升级至最新版本或修改默认密钥，并禁止公网访问，避免给业务带来安全风险。
description_en:
There is an identity authentication bypass vulnerability in the open source service management platform Nacos. Since Nacos does not modify token.secret.key by default, when authentication is enabled, remote attackers can bypass key authentication and enter the background, causing consequences such as system control.
The system is usually deployed on the intranet for service discovery and configuration management. Historically, there have been multiple functional features that led to authentication bypass and unauthorized vulnerabilities. It is recommended to upgrade to the latest version or modify the default key, and prohibit public network access to avoid bringing security risks to the business.

vuln_name: Jenkins 跨站脚本攻击漏洞(CVE-2023-27905)
description: Jenkins 更新中心存在存储型跨站点脚本 (XSS) 漏洞，攻击者可以上传托管插件利用该漏洞。
description_en: Jenkins Update Center has a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could allow an attacker to upload a managed plugin to exploit.

vuln_name: Jenkins 跨站脚本攻击漏洞(CVE-2023-27898)
description: Jenkins 插件管理器中存在存储型跨站点脚本 (XSS) 漏洞，允许攻击者利用脚本控制台 API在 Jenkins 服务器上运行任意代码。
description_en: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Jenkins Plugin Manager that allows attackers to run arbitrary code on the Jenkins server by leveraging the script console API.

vuln_name: FortiOS 目录穿越漏洞(CVE-2022-41328)
description: FortiOS 存在目录穿越漏洞，这可能允许本地特权攻击者通过精心设计的 CLI 命令读取和写入任意文件。最终可能导致任意命令执行。
description_en: FortiOS has a directory traversal vulnerability, which may allow local privileged attackers to read and write arbitrary files through carefully designed CLI commands. This can eventually lead to arbitrary command execution.

vuln_name: Smartbi 远程命令执行漏洞(QVD-2023-5326)
description:
Smartbi是广州思迈特软件有限公司旗下的商业智能BI和数据分析品牌，为企业客户提供一站式商业智能解决方案。Smartbi大数据分析产品融合BI定义的所有阶段，对接各种业务数据库、数据仓库和大数据分析平台，进行加工处理、分析挖掘和可视化展现；满足所有用户的各种数据分析应用需求，如大数据分析、可视化分析、探索式分析、复杂报表、应用分享等等。
Smartbi大数据分析平台存在远程命令执行漏洞，未经身份认证的远程攻击者可利用stub接口构造请求绕过补丁限制，进而控制JDBC URL，最终可导致远程代码执行或信息泄露。
description_en:
Smartbi is the business intelligence BI and data analytics brand under Guangzhou Smart Software Co., Ltd., which provides enterprise customers with one-stop business intelligence solutions. Smartbi big data analysis product integrates all phases defined by BI, butts various business database, data warehouse and big data analytics platform, performs processing processing, analysis mining and visualization demonstration; satisfies all users' various data analysis application requirements, such as big data analyses, visualization analyses, exploratory analyses, complex reports, application sharing and so on.
The Smartbi big data analysis platform has remote command execution vulnerabilities. Unauthenticated remote attackers can use the stub interface to construct requests to bypass patch restrictions, and then control the JDBC URL, which can eventually lead to remote code execution or information disclosure.
qpe_manufacture_name: 广州思迈特软件有限公司

vuln_name: Joomla 未授权访问漏洞(CVE-2023-23752)
threat_category: 信息泄露,身份认证绕过
technical_category: 未授权访问,访问控制不恰当
description: Joomla 中存在未授权访问漏洞，由于对 Web 服务端点的访问限制不当，远程攻击者可以绕过安全限制访问 Web 应用程序敏感信息。
description_en: An unauthorized access vulnerability exists in Joomla. Due to improper access restrictions on web service endpoints, remote attackers can bypass security restrictions to access sensitive web application information.
vuln_type: 信息泄露,身份认证绕过
malicious_type: 未授权访问,访问控制不恰当

vuln_name: React-admin 跨站点脚本攻击漏洞(CVE-2023-25572)
description: React-admin 是一款提供前端组件，同时还提供后端数据接口的框架。目前它在 github 上有 21.5K 的star。<RichTextField>dangerouslySetInnerHTML在没有客户端清理的情况下使用输出字段值。如果数据未在服务器端进行清理，则会引发跨站点脚本 (XSS) 攻击。
description_en: React-admin is a framework that provides front-end components while also providing back-end data interfaces. Currently it has star for 21.5K on github. <RichTextField>dangerouslySetInnerHTML uses output field values without client sanitization. If the data is not sanitized on the server side, a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack is launched.

vuln_name: Apple WebKit 任意代码执行漏洞(CVE-2023-23529)
vuln_name_en: Apple WebKit Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2023-23529)
description:
WebKit 是一个开源的浏览器引擎，主要用于Safari，Dashboard，Mail 和其他一些Mac OS X 程序。WebKit 内核在手机上的应用十分广泛，例如 Google 的手机Android、 Apple 的iPhone，还应用在 Mac OS X 平台默认的浏览器 Safari 桌面浏览器内。
WebKit 中存在类型混淆错误，未经身份认证的远程攻击者诱骗受害者访问其特制的恶意网站，使WebKit处理网页内容时触发类型混淆错误，最终在目标系统上实现任意代码执行。
description_en:
WebKit is an open source browser engine, mainly used for Safari, Dashboard, Mail and some other Mac OS X programs. The WebKit kernel is widely used on mobile phones, such as Google's mobile Android, Apple's iPhone, and it is also used in the default browser on the Mac OS X platform, Safari desktop browser.
There is a Type Confusion error in WebKit. An unauthenticated remote attacker tricks the victim into visiting a specially crafted malicious website, causing the Type Confusion error to be triggered when the web content is processed, and finally achieving arbitrary code execution on the target system.

vuln_name: IPython 命令注入漏洞(CVE-2023-24816)
technical_category: OS命令注入,数据验证不恰当
description: IPython 提供交互式 Python shell 和 Jupyter 内核以交互方式使用 Python。在特定条件下容易在set_term_title 函数中进行命令注入。
description_en: IPython provides an interactive Python shell and a Jupyter kernel to use Python interactively. It is vulnerable to command injection in the set_term_title function under certain conditions.
malicious_type: OS命令注入,数据验证不恰当

vuln_name: Huawei E5573Cs-322 拒绝服务漏洞(CVE-2018-7935)
vuln_name_en: Huawei E5573Cs-322 Denial of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2018-7935)
description:
Huawei E5573Cs-322是中国华为（Huawei）公司的一款无线路由器。 
Huawei E5573Cs-322 21.328.01.00.00版本存在安全漏洞。攻击者利用该漏洞使E5573Cs-322的网络暂时不可用。
description_en:
Huawei E5573Cs-322 is a wireless router of China's Huawei (Huawei) company.
Huawei E5573Cs-322 version 21.328.01.00.00 has security vulnerabilities. Attackers exploit this vulnerability to make the network of E5573Cs-322 temporarily unavailable.

vuln_name: ThinkPHP 反序列化漏洞(CVE-2022-45982)
description: ThinkPHP 存在反序列化漏洞，攻击者可以通过精心设计的有效负载执行任意代码。
description_en: ThinkPHP has a deserialization vulnerability, an attacker can execute arbitrary code through a carefully designed payload.

vuln_name: Wallabag 拒绝服务漏洞(CVE-2023-0734)
description: Wallabag 存在IDOR 漏洞，IDOR 漏洞允许添加标签条目用户其他，允许为任何用户添加标签，因为没有用户身份验证。并且不限制输入导致入口界面崩溃.
description_en: Wallabag has an IDOR vulnerability. IDOR vulnerabilities allow users to add tag entries. Other users are allowed to add tags for any user because there is no user authentication. And does not restrict the input to cause the entry interface to crash.

vuln_name: Apache Kafka JNDI注入漏洞(CVE-2023-25194)
description: 在 Apache Kafka Connect 中存在 JNDI 注入漏洞，当攻击者可访问 Kafka Connect worker，并可以创建或修改连接器时，通过将 sasl.jaas.config 属性设置为 com.sun.security.auth.module.JndiLoginModule ，从而可注入攻击者设置的 LDAP 地址，最终可导致 JNDI 注入，造成 RCE 需低版本 JDK 或目标 Connect 存在利用链。
description_en: There is a JNDI injection vulnerability in Apache Kafka Connect. When an attacker can access the Kafca Connect worker and can create or modify the connector, by setting the sasl.jaas.config attribute to  com.sun.security.auth.module.JndiLoginModule , the LDAP address set by the attacker can be injected, which can eventually lead to JNDIs injection, causing RCE to require a lower version of JDK or the existence of the target Connect exploit chain.

vuln_name: GoAnywhere MFT命令执行漏洞(CVE-2023-0669)
description: GoAnywhere MFT 中存在反序列化漏洞，远程攻击者可通过发送特制的序列化对象至管理端口，服务端接收此请求未进行过滤从而反序列化任意攻击者控制的对象，这可造成任意代码执行。
description_en: There is a deserialization vulnerability in GoAnywhere MFT. A remote attacker can send a specially crafted serialized object to the management port, and the server receives this request without filtering to deserialize any attacker-controlled object, which can cause arbitrary code execution.

vuln_name: Wavlink WL-WN530H4 访问控制错误漏洞(CVE-2022-48165)
vuln_name_en: Wavlink WL-WN530H4 Access Control Error Vulnerability (CVE-2022-48165)
description: Wavlink WL-WN530H4 M30H4.V5030.210121 的/cgi-bin/ExportLogs.sh 接口存在访问控制问题，允许未经身份验证的攻击者下载配置数据和日志文件并获取管理员凭据。
description_en: An access control issue exists in the /cgi-bin/ExportLogs.sh interface of Wavlink WL-WN530H4 M30H4.V5030.210121 that allows an unauthenticated attacker to download configuration data and log files and obtain administrator credentials.

vuln_name: Pimcore 任意文件上传漏洞(CVE-2023-23937)
description: Pimcore 是开源数据和体验管理平台。在Pimcore 的某个接口中存在漏洞，上传文件时未校验文件内容，允许攻击者绕过安全检查，上传带有js内容的HTML文件。
description_en: Pimcore is an open source data and experience management platform. There is a vulnerability in a certain interface of Pimcore. The content of the file is not verified when uploading the file, allowing an attacker to bypass the security check and upload an HTML file with js content.
